\w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w unfaithful|strong="H4603"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w prostituted|strong="H2181"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* gods \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*, \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* God \w had|strong="H5971"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.
